description: A guy with black hair and beard is sitting at a desk in an office, wearing a blue shirt and headphones, the name Scott is written on the office door.
The same guy is now standing in front of a white board, marker in hand, drawing a diagram.
text: Scott: Let me show you my plan

description: The same guy is now sitting at a table with a group of people, who are all looking at him and smiling.
text: Scott: I'm confident that this will be a success

description: The same guy is now in a meeting room, sitting at the head of a table, giving a presentation.
text: Scott: This is the future of our company

description: The same guy is now standing in front of a large group of people, giving a speech.
text: Scott: We are on the cusp of something truly great

description: The same guy is now sitting at his desk, looking at a computer screen, smiling.
text: Scott: I can't wait to see what the future holds
